Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ranatuerin-2Pb (natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; 1S=S, UCSS1)
Sequence Information.Source: Skin Secretion, Northern leopard frog,Rana pipiens, North America

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (70.6%) toPalustrin-2cMol formula: C155H273N41O46S2; Mol Wt: 3524.241; GRAVY: 0.59; hydrophobicity: 0.486; hydrophobic moment 0.368; 20% T; 11% K, V, and L, no M, P, Y, Q, E, and H.Activity: Active against S. aureus (MIC 8 uM), E. coli (MIC 8 uM), MRSA (MIC 16 uM), and C. albicans (MIC 8 uM). kill bacteria and candida at similar concentraitons.Structure: Helical in 50% TFE or POPG contaiing lipid mixtures.Toxicity: HC50 16 uM, highly hemolytic. 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Zhou X, Shi D, Zhong R,Ye Z, Ma C, Zhou M, Xi X, Wang L, Chen T, Kwok HF. 2019
Literature Information.Title: Bioevaluation of Ranatuerin-2Pb from the Frog Skin Secretion of Rana pipiens and its Truncated Analogues
